Analyst Programmer

Al Hashar & Co. LLC. –In house developed ERP on iSe ries.

o Represented ICT in VAT analytics seminar conducted b y KPMG, Crowe

o Parameterized the Tax master file to flexibly adjus t with VAT once it is  
rolled out In Oman.
